# `CroCoNet` Cross-species Comparison of Networks

CroCoNet is a framework to quantitatively compare gene regulatory
networks across species and identify conserved and diverged modules. It
hinges on contrasting module variability within and across species in
order to distinguish true evolutionary divergence from confounding
factors such as diversity across individuals, environmental differences
and technical noise.

![Pipeline](reference/figures/pipeline.png)  
^(The main steps of the CroCoNet workflow)

## ‚¨áÔ∏è Installation

For the installation, the R package `devtools` is needed.

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
```

Once `devtools` is available, you can install the development version of
`CroCoNet` and all its dependencies from GitHub with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("Hellmann-Lab/CroCoNet")
```

## üìñ User guide

For a step-by-step guide and detailed explanations, please check out the
vignette on the analysis of an example scRNA-seq dataset:

``` r
browseVignettes("CroCoNet")
```

You can access this vignette, along with the documentation of all
functions, on the [CroCoNet
website](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/)
as well.

## üìú Citation

The CroCoNet framework and its biological applications are described in
detail in our
[preprint](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2025.11.18.689002v1)
on bioRxiv. Please cite this manuscript as follows:

``` r
citation("CroCoNet")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`POU5F1_target_conservation`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/POU5F1_target_conservation.md)
  : Cross-species conservation measures of the target genes in the
  POU5F1 module
- [`addDirectionality()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/addDirectionality.md)
  : Add directionality of interactions
- [`applyPower()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/applyPower.md)
  : Apply soft-thresholding
- [`assignInitialModules()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/assignInitialModules.md)
  : Assign initial modules
- [`calculateEdgeDivergence()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/calculateEdgeDivergence.md)
  : Calculate the divergence of intramodular edges
- [`calculateEigengenes()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/calculateEigengenes.md)
  : Calculate module eigengenes
- [`calculatePresStats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/calculatePresStats.md)
  : Calculate preservation statistics
- [`calculateTreeStats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/calculateTreeStats.md)
  : Calculate tree statistics across all modules
- [`comparePresStats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/comparePresStats.md)
  : Compare preservation statistics
- [`consensus_network`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/consensus_network.md)
  : Consensus network
- [`convertPresToDist()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/convertPresToDist.md)
  : Convert preservation statistics to distances across all modules
- [`convertToDT()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/convertToDT.md)
  : Convert a list of igraphs to a list of data tables
- [`convertToGraph()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/convertToGraph.md)
  : Convert a list of data frames to a list of igraphs
- [`createConsensus()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/createConsensus.md)
  : Create consensus network
- [`createRandomModules()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/createRandomModules.md)
  : Create random modules
- [`dist`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/dist.md) :
  Distance measures of the pruned modules
- [`dist_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/dist_jk.md)
  : Distance measures of the original and jackknifed pruned modules
- [`eigengenes`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/eigengenes.md)
  : Eigengenes
- [`eigengenes_per_species`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/eigengenes_per_species.md)
  : Eigengenes per species
- [`filterModuleTrees()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/filterModuleTrees.md)
  : Filter modules based on their tree representations
- [`findConservedDivergedModules()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/findConservedDivergedModules.md)
  : Find conserved and diverged modules
- [`findConservedDivergedTargets()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/findConservedDivergedTargets.md)
  : Find conserved and diverged target genes within a module
- [`fitTreeStatsLm()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/fitTreeStatsLm.md)
  : Fit (weighted) linear model between tree-based statistics
- [`genes`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/genes.md)
  : All genes
- [`getRegulators()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/getRegulators.md)
  : Get transcriptional regulators
- [`getTreeDf()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/getTreeDf.md)
  : Convert a tree to a data frame
- [`gtf_list`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/gtf_list.md)
  : List of genomic annotations
- [`image_TRs`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/image_TRs.md)
  : IMAGE transcriptional regulators
- [`initial_modules`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/initial_modules.md)
  : Initial modules
- [`jaspar_core_TRs`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/jaspar_core_TRs.md)
  : JASPAR 2024 vertebrate core transcriptional regulators
- [`jaspar_unvalidated_TRs`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/jaspar_unvalidated_TRs.md)
  : JASPAR 2024 unvalidated transcriptional regulators
- [`lm_overall`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/lm_overall.md)
  : Linear model for the characterization of overall module conservation
- [`loadNetworks()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/loadNetworks.md)
  : Load networks as a list of igraph objects
- [`module_conservation_overall`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/module_conservation_overall.md)
  : Cross-species conservation measures per module
- [`network_list`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/network_list.md)
  : List of networks
- [`network_list_raw`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/network_list_raw.md)
  : List of raw networks
- [`normalizeEdgeWeights()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/normalizeEdgeWeights.md)
  : Normalize edge weights between 0 and 1
- [`plotConservedDivergedModules()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotConservedDivergedModules.md)
  : Plot module conservation
- [`plotConservedDivergedTargets()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotConservedDivergedTargets.md)
  : Plot target conservation
- [`plotDistMats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotDistMats.md)
  : Plot the distance matrices of replicates based on module
  connectivity patterns
- [`plotEigengeneHeatmap()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotEigengeneHeatmap.md)
  : Plot module eigengenes as a heatmap
- [`plotEigengenesAlongPseudotime()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotEigengenesAlongPseudotime.md)
  : Plot module eigengenes along a pseudotime trajectory
- [`plotEigengenesViolin()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotEigengenesViolin.md)
  : Plot eigengene distributions per cell type and species
- [`plotExprAlongPseudotime()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotExprAlongPseudotime.md)
  : Plot expression profiles along a pseudotime trajectory
- [`plotExprHeatmap()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotExprHeatmap.md)
  : Plot expression profiles as a heatmap
- [`plotExprViolin()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotExprViolin.md)
  : Plot expression distributions per cell type and species
- [`plotModuleSizeDistribution()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotModuleSizeDistribution.md)
  : Plot the distribution of module sizes
- [`plotNetworks()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotNetworks.md)
  : Plot the networks of modules
- [`plotPresStatDistributions()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotPresStatDistributions.md)
  : Plot the distributions of preservation statistics
- [`plotPresStats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotPresStats.md)
  : Plot cross-species VS within-species preservation statistics per
  species pair
- [`plotSumEigengeneHeatmap()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotSumEigengeneHeatmap.md)
  : Plot summarized eigengenes as a heatmap
- [`plotSumEigengenesLine()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotSumEigengenesLine.md)
  : Plot summarized eigengenes as a line plot
- [`plotSumExprHeatmap()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotSumExprHeatmap.md)
  : Plot summarized expression profiles as a heatmap
- [`plotSumExprLine()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotSumExprLine.md)
  : Plot summarized expression profiles as a line plot
- [`plotTreeStatDistributions()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotTreeStatDistributions.md)
  : Plot the distributions of tree-based statistics
- [`plotTreeStats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotTreeStats.md)
  : Plot tree-based statistics against each other
- [`plotTrees()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/plotTrees.md)
  : Plot the tree representations of modules
- [`pres_stats`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pres_stats.md)
  : Preservation statistics of the pruned modules
- [`pres_stats_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pres_stats_jk.md)
  : Preservation statistics of the original and jackknifed pruned
  modules
- [`pruneModules()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pruneModules.md)
  : Prune modules
- [`pruneModules_UIK_adj()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pruneModules_UIK_adj.md)
  : Prune modules based on the regulator-target adjacencies using
  dynamic filtering
- [`pruneModules_UIK_adj_kIM()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pruneModules_UIK_adj_kIM.md)
  : Prune modules based on the regulator-target adjacencies and
  intramodular connectivities using dynamic filtering
- [`pruneModules_topN()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pruneModules_topN.md)
  : Prune modules based on the regulator-target adjacencies by keeping a
  fixed number of top targets
- [`pruned_modules`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/pruned_modules.md)
  : Pruned modules
- [`random_dist_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_dist_jk.md)
  : Distance measures of the the original and jackknifed random modules
- [`random_modules`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_modules.md)
  : Random modules
- [`random_pres_stats`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_pres_stats.md)
  : Preservation statistics of the random modules
- [`random_pres_stats_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_pres_stats_jk.md)
  : Preservation statistics of the the original and jackknifed random
  modules
- [`random_tree_stats`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_tree_stats.md)
  : Tree-based statistics of the random modules
- [`random_tree_stats_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_tree_stats_jk.md)
  : Tree-based statistics of the original and jackknifed random modules
- [`random_trees_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/random_trees_jk.md)
  : Trees of the original and jackknifed random modules
- [`reconstructTrees()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/reconstructTrees.md)
  : Reconstruct trees across all modules
- [`regulators`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/regulators.md)
  : Transcriptional regulators
- [`removeOverlappingGenePairs()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/removeOverlappingGenePairs.md)
  : Remove gene pairs with overlapping annotations
- [`replicate2species`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/replicate2species.md)
  : Replicate-species conversion
- [`scaleFreeFitRSquared()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/scaleFreeFitRSquared.md)
  : Calculate R2 value of the scale-free model fit for the provided
  connectivities
- [`sce`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/sce.md) :
  SCE object of the primate neural differentiation dataset
- [`selectPower()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/selectPower.md)
  : Select power for scale-free transfrmation
- [`summarizeJackknifeStats()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/summarizeJackknifeStats.md)
  : Summarize jackknife statistics
- [`summarizeStat()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/summarizeStat.md)
  : Summarize values of a statistic
- [`testPowers()`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/testPowers.md)
  : Test soft-thresholding power values
- [`tree`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/tree.md) :
  Phylogenetic tree
- [`tree_stats`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/tree_stats.md)
  : Tree-based statistics of the pruned modules
- [`tree_stats_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/tree_stats_jk.md)
  : Tree-based statistics of the original and jackknifed pruned modules
- [`trees`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/trees.md)
  : Trees of the pruned modules
- [`trees_jk`](https://hellmann-lab.github.io/CroCoNet/reference/trees_jk.md)
  : Trees of the original and jackknifed pruned modules

### All vignettes
